Title: Requires third-party accommodation reservation services identify themselves as such to users and not charge certain fees
Summary: Requires third-party accommodation reservation services identify themselves as such to users and not levy certain cancellation fees.
LawCode: Add ยง391-x, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring third-party accommodation reservation services identify themselves as such to users and not levy certain cancellation fees
